name: Stones Keeper II: Chaos Lord
storyline: After the tragic death of King Aurelius, Archbishop Marius approaches the Elder Undead Lords with the desire to strike a deal with them. Succumbing to temptation, Marius plans to obtain an artifact capable of giving the Inquisition an unlimited power. In return, he will help the lords capture the coveted Temple of Water. The Undead Lords accept the deal and so the Lord of Chaos enters the game.
summary:
In Stones Keeper II: Chaos Lord, you'll immerse yourself in a fantasy world as a leader of a squad of the Circle of Unquenchable Thirst. Along with recruiting, leveling, arming, and providing for your army, you'll be in charge of your very own flying fortress. Growing it and improving its system will prove invaluable to challenges ahead.

You'll be able to create a unique squad, by recruiting new warriors with a multitude of skills and weapon preferences. The tasks that will be assigned to you will require not only the strength of your warriors, but also cunning. The search for valuable artifacts, raiding cities, subduing enemy commanders, desecrating lands, and capturing altars are only a few of the challenges you will face.

Every choice opens up opportunities. Change tactics and try new powers. In "Stones Keeper II: Chaos Lord" all means are good to leave your mark on history, be it force, diplomacy, or magic! Your decisions will determine the fate of the kingdom.
